name: Youtube Minimal Grey
description: Minimalist YouTube style that removes unnecessary features and uses a consistent grey color. Similar to feather.
additional_info:
- Clear CSS commenting so you can easily add wanted elements back in.
- Colors the page a uniform grey.
- Removes box design from remaining elements.
- Removes:
-- Notification button
-- Upload button
-- Account button
-- Alerts
-- Uploader's image
-- Subscription button
-- Like/dislike/view area
-- View numbers for related videos
-- Comment section
-- Page footer

Derivative of: https://userstyles.org/styles/120734/youtube-feathery
